name: Game Tester Quest
description:
Game Tester Quest is an old school RPG that lets the player play 3 separate games as a test subject.

These games will come out in the following order:
- Fantasy RPG
- Detective RPG
- Cyberpunk RPG

Works in Progress:
- Other castle interiors and dungeons
- Enemy health bars
- Turkish language support

Additional information:
- All visuals are subject to change during the game's early access
- Game system requirements are based on RPG Maker MZ, where the game is developed
